Description: Green-glazed steatite scarab, clypeus marked, striated legs notched in places, longitudinally pierced, base inscribed with name of Apopi.
Curator's comments: Published: Pharaonen Und Fremde Catalogue (Vienna 1994): No.156
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1994 7 Sep-26 Oct, Austria, Vienna, Museen der Stadt Wien, Pharanen und Fremde
